dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Hello, Bob. How are you today?

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: I am well, thanks for asking. What brings you here?

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: I was just out for a walk and saw your shop. I thought I would come in and say hello.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: That's very kind of you. Can I help you find anything?
